|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GEME-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63CFR-RDC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Micro-B) Female |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2018 |estprice = 28 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0B9RLGH3Z |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== :'''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Zero''' board *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H2+ @1.0GHz (H.265/HEVC) :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) :GPU: ''Mali-400 MP2'' @600MHz, OpenGL ES 2.0 *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) RAM (shared w/ GPU) *Wi-Fi: [[AMPAK]] AP6212, BT 4.0, :SDIO (option AP6181, AP6335) *Network: 1x 10/100 Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port
*Audio outputs: HDMI Mini *Video input: CSI input connector :Camera: Supports 8-bit YUV422 CMOS sensor interface, :Supports CCIR656 protocol for NTSC and PAL, :Supports SM pixel camera sensor, :Supports video capture solution up to 1080p @30fps *Video outputs: Supports HDMI output with HDCP, CEC, 3D function, :Integrated CVBS, Supports simultaneous output of HDMI and CVBS *GPIO: 40x Pins header (compatible w/ Raspberry Pi B+) *LED: Power led & Status led *Power: 5V/2A via Micro USB *OS: Android, Ubuntu
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi#Banana_Pi_BPI-P2_Zero ''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Zero'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-P2_Zero ''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Zero'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/08/02/banana-pi-bpi-p2-zero-board-poe-camera-allwinner-h2/ ''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Zero Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/two-new-open-spec-banana-pi-boards-feature-poe/ ''Two new open-spec Banana Pi boards feature PoE'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
